Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Shahad A:

This is the best place in Charleston to get authentic Arabic food and groceries. The staff are amazing and very friendly, highly recommended!!

Review by - Yelp

Daniela Z:

I love this spot! Everything is fresh and they are always so kind and friendly. I forgot to take a picture of the pistachio baklava which was also DELICIOUS.

Review by - Yelp

Sheila K:

Amazing! We ordered chicken kabob platters with an order of hummus. We are not disappointed. The food is fresh and flavorful.

Review by - Yelp

Lauren K:

This place is so authentic and amazing!! They are so friendly and their food is always cooked to order and so delicious, I would eat here every day if I could, you have to try their hummus too it's the best

Review by - Yelp

Courtney U:

My husband has been deployed where they had food like this and he was craving it and we found this place. The staff is so friendly and the food honestly makes me cry it's so so good...
